amendment.description: Amendments en bloc No. 5 consisting of amendments numbered 5, 6, 7, 11, 14, 19, 31, and 33 printed in House Report 111-498.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments nos. 5, 6, 7, 11, 14, 19, 31, and 33 printed in House Report 111-498.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A015) offered by Mr. Andrews.
On agreeing to the Andrews amendments (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
